name: Voog Design System
description:
We are excited to share our design system Figma UI kit publicly. The UI kit was created to bring our designers & developers closer and unify the experience across the product.


Read more about why we decided to make it public in our blog: 

https://medium.com/@voog/why-build-a-design-system-and-then-give-it-away-for-free-heres-voog-s-story-d7a2fce2907e
